targets.expr: (sum by (pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="designer", container="designer-das", pod=~"[[Pod]]"}) / sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",namespace="designer", container="designer-das", pod=~"[[Pod]]"})) * 100

(sum by (pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="designer", container="designer-das", pod=~"[[Pod]]"}) / sum by (pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",namespace="designer", container="designer-das", pod=~"[[Pod]]"})) * 100

sum by (ccid) (increase(das_http_requests_total{status="4xx", namespace="designer", container="designer-das", pod=~"[[Pod]]",  ccid != "none"}[5m]))
